title: 'When cocoa farmers cried over delayed payments, you gave them a ‘haircut' - Minority
desc: The Minority Chief Whip in Parliament, Frank Annoh-Dompreh, has criticised the government for failing to brief Parliament on the reduction of the producer price of cocoa to GH¢2,587 per bag for the remainder of the 2025/2026 crop season.

title: Webb telescope reveals Uranus' upper atmosphere in unprecedented detail

title: 'Potential tragedy': Seven people rescued from Waikato River
